question: What was the theme of the 4th edition of the Global Conference on Pharmaceutical & Medical Device, 2019 held in Bengaluru?
option1: Med-Tech India: Gearing up for Ayushman Bharat
option2: Med-Tech India: Gearing up for Healthy India
option3: Med-Tech India: Gearing up for Sehat India
option4: Med-Tech India: Gearing up for Quality Health
answer: Med-Tech India: Gearing up for Ayushman Bharat
explanation: The Department of Pharmaceuticals (DoP), Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers, along with Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce & Industry (FICCI), organised the 4th International Conference on Pharmaceutical & Medical Device sector on 18th – 19th February 2019 in Bengaluru. The theme for India Pharma 2019 is ‘Enabling Quality Affordable Healthcare’ and that of India Medical Device 2019 is ‘Med-Tech India: Gearing up for Ayushman Bharat’.
